creator: laurent.hauben@hedrys.com
text:
For Time zones between GMT and GMT+09:30, the format is H0mm, it would be +0Hmm.
For example, the "GMT+01:00" time zone is formatted 1000, apache format the 
same to +0100.

Regards.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18467 ***
